verses.verse: And Miriam <S%H4813><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> against Moses <S%H4872><s%> because of <S%H182><s%> the Ethiopian <S%H3571><s%> woman <S%H802><s%> whom he had married <S%H3947><s%>: for he had married <S%H3947><s%> an Ethiopian <S%H3571><s%> woman <S%H802><s%>.

And they said <S%H559><s%>, Has the Lord <S%H3068><s%> indeed spoken <S%H1696><s%> only by Moses <S%H4872><s%>? has he not spoken <S%H1696><s%> also by us <S%H3068><s%>? And the Lord heard it <S%H8085><s%>.
(Now the man <S%H376><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> was very <S%H3966><s%> meek <S%H6035><s%>, above all the men <S%H120><s%> which were upon the face <S%H6440><s%> of the earth <S%H127><s%>.)

And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H559><s%> suddenly <S%H6597><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, and unto Aaron <S%H175><s%>, and unto Miriam <S%H4813><s%>, Come out <S%H3318><s%> you three <S%H7969><s%> unto the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation <S%H4150><s%>. And they three <S%H7969><s%> came out <S%H3318><s%>.

And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> came down <S%H3381><s%> in the pillar <S%H5982><s%> of the cloud <S%H6051><s%>, and stood <S%H5975><s%> in the door <S%H6607><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H168><s%>, and called <S%H7121><s%> Aaron <S%H175><s%> and Miriam <S%H4813><s%>: and they both <S%H8147><s%> came forth <S%H3318><s%>.

And he said <S%H559><s%>, Hear <S%H8085><s%> now my words <S%H1697><s%>: If there be a prophet <S%H5030><s%> among you <S%H3068><s%>, I the Lord will make myself known <S%H3045><s%> unto him in a vision <S%H4759><s%>, and will speak <S%H1696><s%> unto him in a dream <S%H2472><s%>.
My servant <S%H5650><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> is not so <S%H539><s%>, who is faithful in all my house <S%H1004><s%>.

With him will I speak <S%H1696><s%> mouth <S%H6310><s%> to mouth <S%H6310><s%>, even plainly <S%H4758><s%>, and not in dark speeches <S%H2420><s%>; and the form <S%H8544><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> shall he behold <S%H5027><s%>: why then were you not afraid <S%H3372><s%> to speak <S%H1696><s%> against my servant <S%H5650><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%>?
And the anger <S%H639><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> was kindled <S%H2734><s%> against them <S%H3212><s%>; and he departed.

And the cloud <S%H6051><s%> departed <S%H5493><s%> from off the tabernacle <S%H168><s%>; and <S%H4813><s%>, behold, Miriam became leprous <S%H6879><s%>, white as snow <S%H7950><s%>: and Aaron <S%H175><s%> looked <S%H6437><s%> upon Miriam <S%H4813><s%>, and <S%H6879><s%>, behold, she was leprous.

And Aaron <S%H175><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, Alas <S%H994><s%>, my lord <S%H113><s%>, I beg you <S%H7896><s%>, lay not the sin <S%H2403><s%> upon us <S%H2973><s%>, where we have done foolishly, and where we have sinned <S%H2398><s%>.
Let her not be as one dead <S%H4994><s%>, of whom the flesh <S%H1320><s%> is half <S%H2677><s%> consumed <S%H398><s%> when he comes out <S%H3318><s%> of his mother <S%H517><s%>'s womb <S%H7358><s%>.
And Moses <S%H4872><s%> cried <S%H6817><s%> unto the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, Heal <S%H7495><s%> her now <S%H410><s%>, O God, I beg you.

And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, If her father <S%H1><s%> had but <S%H3417><s%> spit <S%H3417><s%> in her face <S%H6440><s%>, should she not be ashamed <S%H3637><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> days <S%H3117><s%>? let her be shut <S%H5462><s%> out <S%H2351><s%> from the camp <S%H4264><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> days <S%H3117><s%>, and after <S%H310><s%> that let her be received in again <S%H622><s%>.

And Miriam <S%H4813><s%> was shut <S%H5462><s%> out <S%H2351><s%> from the camp <S%H4264><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> days <S%H3117><s%>: and the people <S%H5971><s%> journeyed <S%H5265><s%> not until Miriam <S%H4813><s%> was brought in again <S%H622><s%>.
And afterward <S%H310><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> removed <S%H5265><s%> from Hazeroth <S%H2698><s%>, and pitched <S%H2583><s%> in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> of Paran <S%H6290><s%>.
